channel.title: How do I Change Max combat lvl
channel.description: Where do I change it?[br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2007, 11:37:58 PM[/size][hr]Help would be appreciated...[br][size=1]Posted on: February 11, 2007, 11:47:34 PM[/size][hr]11 reads no reply...

item.title: How do I Change Max combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @pbrain31 pbrain31
item.description:
@pbrain31 wrote:

no you dont thats the CMB you need int MaxCombatLevel = ##;
not that

item.title: How do I Change Max combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @MastrChief MastrChief
item.description:
@MastrChief wrote:

thank you very much![br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2007, 12:50:05 AM[/size][hr]1 last question… how do i set it to combat 126…[br][size=1]Posted on: February 12, 2007, 12:53:13 AM[/size][hr]int combatLevel = 0;
Change this to int combatLevel = 126; ?

item.source: How do I Change Max combat lvl

item.title: How do I Change Max combat lvl
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Search for this in player.java:

int mag = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[4])) * 1.5); int ran = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[6])) * 1.5); int attstr = (int)((double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[0])) + (double)(getLevelForXP(playerXP[2])));

It should be under it.

Read full topic
